title: IaC – Azure Bicep Modules
summary: Reusable Bicep modules for multi-tenant deployments with parameterized naming (<ORG_NAME>-<APP_NAME>-<ENV>) and subscription-level orchestration.
highlights: Key Vault, Storage, Log Analytics, ACR, Container Apps env modules
Dev/Prod parameter files with safe placeholders
Validation workflow that builds all .bicep files
